meanings.definition: The quality or state of being seamless.
meanings.sent1: The seamlessness of the dress made it look perfectly smooth.
meanings.sent2: The seamlessness of the presentation impressed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The seamlessness of the plan made everyone believe it was magic.
meanings.sent4: The seamlessness of the transition from day to night was like a gentle whisper.
meanings.sent5: The seamlessness of the operation left no room for error.

meanings.definition: The absence of visible seams or joints.
meanings.sent1: The seamlessness of the fabric made it feel like one continuous piece.
meanings.sent2: The seamlessness of the glass surface gave it a sleek appearance.
meanings.sent3: The seamlessness of the puzzle made it impossible to solve.
meanings.sent4: The seamlessness of the sky meeting the ocean was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The seamlessness of the design hid all imperfections.
